entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:53 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to periods of snow late this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
